comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of May 9, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10F12FC345A1273... and May 18, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60815FB39581673... the Atlantic Fleet was in New York between those dates for a review by President Wilson.
